title: Demystifying BitCoin as an E-Commerce Payment Method

authors.name: Benjamin Odoi-Lartey
authors.affiliation: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology

authors.name: Michael Asante
authors.affiliation: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology

abstract: This paper seeks to clarify Bitcoin as an E-commerce payment method. The paper introduces the reader to the history behind BitCoin and demonstrates an empirical study of the payment and investment features associated with Bitcoin and its implementation into E-commerce.
